addrLine1.description: The first address line in a formatted address.

addrLine2.description: The second address line in a formatted address.

locality.description: An area of defined or undefined boundaries within a local authority or other legislatively defined area, usually rural or semi rural in nature.

city.description: The city that the address is in.

stateOrProvince.description: The State or Province that the address is in.

postcode.description: Descriptor for a postal delivery area, used to speed and simplify the delivery of mail (also known as ZIP code).

postcodeExtension.description: An extension of a postal code. E.g. the part following the dash in an American urban property address.

country.description: Country that the address is in.

siteName.description: A name by which the site is known.

siteCompanyName.description: The name of the company located at the service site.

endCustomerName.description: The name of the end (retail) customer.

additionalSiteInformation.description: Additional information about the Site or special delivery information.

siteDescription.description: A description for the service site.
